name: Macaroni, Pineapple, and Ham Salad
author: Jodi
summary: This delicious macaroni salad is so refreshing. My husband and I came up with it using ingredients we prefer and we make this regularly during the summer to go with lunches or as a meal on a really hot day. Easy recipe to modify according to your own preferences. Get creative and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package whole wheat elbow macaroni
1 (8 ounce) ham steak, cut into cubes
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes; drain
Transfer hot macaroni to a large bowl
Pour Italian-style salad dressing and crushed pineapple over the macaroni; stir
Add ham, celery, tomatoes, eggs, and onion; stir
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour
